dkeep.logic

Class Ogre

    • dkeep.logic.Elements

extends Elements
    Ogre.java - class to the ogre representation in the game
    Author:
    Rui Guedes and César Pinho
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(Elements ogre,
            Elements club)
        Class constructor specifying the ogre coordinates and the club coordinates on the game map.
        Parameters:
        ogre - coordinates of the ogre
        club - coordinates of the club

    • Method Detail

      • changeCoords

        public Elements changeCoords(Elements position,
                             int move)
        Increment or decrement one of the coordinates depending of the direction of the movement.

        Up (w) - increment x coordinate;

        Right (d) - increment y coordinate;

        Down (s) - decrement x coordinate;

        Left (a) - decrement y coordinate.

        Parameters:
        position - coordinates of the element
        move - movement of the element
        Returns:
        The coordinates of the new position.

      • checkAround

        public boolean checkAround(int move,
                           char[][] tmpMap)
        Check if the position after the movement is occupied or not.
        Parameters:
        move - movement of the element
        tmpMap - game map to detect collisions with objects
        Returns:
        True if the position is free, false otherwise.

      • generateMove

        public Elements generateMove(Elements position,
                             char[][] tmpMap)
        Generate a random move, checking if is a valid movement by the checkAround function, and call the changeCoords function to effect the move.
        Parameters:
        position - position of the element
        tmpMap - game map to detect collisions with objects
        Returns:
        Return the result of the changeCoords function.

      • ogreMovement

        public void ogreMovement(Hero hero,
                         char[][] tmpMap)
        Check if the hero stunned the ogre (if he is near him) and stop the ogre in affirmative case. if the ogre is stunned, it decreases the number of stopped turns. Otherwise, call the generateMove function to move the ogre and call the clubMovement to move the club.
        Parameters:
        hero - coordinates of the hero
        tmpMap - game map to detect collisions with objects

      • clubMovement

        public void clubMovement(char[][] tmpMap)
        Call the generateMove function and change the club coordinates by the function.
        Parameters:
        tmpMap - game map to detect collisions with objects
